H0.text: It is odorless is the property of water that is most important for living organisms.

H1.text: It does not conduct electricity is the property of water that is most important for living organisms.

H2.text: It is tasteless is the property of water that is most important for living organisms.

H3.text: It is liquid at most temperatures on Earth is the property of water most important for living organisms.

A4.text: Water is transparent, tasteless, odorless, and nearly colorless chemical substance.

A5.text: Water is a weak solution of hydronium hydroxide –there is an equilibrium 2H2O ⇌ H3O+ + OH−, in combination with solvation of the resulting hydronium and hydroxide ions.
